pr_title: Add job serializer IMDG Map, Cache & Observable tests

timeline.message: Add job serializer supporting IMDG Map, Cache & Observable tests
Add job serializer supporting IMDG Map, Cache & Observable tests

timeline.bodyText: This should be two tests. Or you can do map reading and writing in one pipeline, I think that's fine.
timeline.author: viliam-durina

timeline.bodyText: Easier might be to do newJob(...).join().
timeline.author: viliam-durina
viliam-durina

timeline.bodyText: We should not register the serializer for the cluster: the test is supposed to test that even if it's not set for the cluster, it works if it's set for the job.
timeline.author: viliam-durina

timeline.message: Configure serializer on client instead of member
Add job serializers map/cache negative scenarios
